mapper.sql: id, add_rule_no, supplier_group_no, supplier_group_name, brand_unit_no, brand_unit_name, category_no, category_name, new_style_flag, style_type, year_code, year, season, two_level_category_no,two_level_category_name, season_name, add_basis, effective_time, add_price, add_discount, discount_rate, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time, (SELECT name FROM settle_new_style WHERE headquarter_price_rule.style_type = settle_new_style.style_no) style_type_name

if.if: AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM headquarter_cost_maintain hcm WHERE hcm.add_rule_no = headquarter_price_rule.add_rule_no)

mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) as s FROM headquarter_price_rule WHERE 1=1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO headquarter_price_rule (two_level_category_no,two_level_category_name,id, add_rule_no, supplier_group_no, supplier_group_name, brand_unit_no, brand_unit_name, category_no, category_name, new_style_flag, style_type, year_code, year, season, season_name, add_basis, effective_time, add_price, add_discount, discount_rate, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time) VALUES (#{twoLevelCategoryNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{twoLevelCategoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{addRuleNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supplierGroupNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supplierGroupName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{brandUnitNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{brandUnitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{categoryNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{categoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{newStyleFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{styleType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{yearCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{year,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{season,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{seasonName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addBasis,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{effectiveTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{addPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{addDiscount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{discountRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
UPDATE headquarter_price_rule
two_level_category_no = #{twoLevelCategoryNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
two_level_category_name = #{twoLevelCategoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
add_rule_no = #{addRuleNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
supplier_group_no = #{supplierGroupNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
supplier_group_name = #{supplierGroupName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
brand_unit_no = #{brandUnitNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
brand_unit_name = #{brandUnitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
category_no = #{categoryNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
category_name = #{categoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
new_style_flag = #{newStyleFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT},
style_type = #{styleType,jdbcType=CHAR},
style_type = '',
year_code = #{yearCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
year_code = '',
year = #{year,jdbcType=CHAR},
year = '',
season = #{season,jdbcType=CHAR},
season = '',
season_name = #{seasonName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
season_name = '',
add_basis = #{addBasis,jdbcType=CHAR},
effective_time = #{effectiveTime,jdbcType=DATE},
add_price = #{addPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
add_price = #{addPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
add_discount = #{addDiscount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
add_discount = #{addDiscount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
discount_rate = #{discountRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
discount_rate = #{discountRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

UPDATE headquarter_price_rule SET add_rule_no = #{addRuleNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, two_level_category_no = #{twoLevelCategoryNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, two_level_category_name = #{twoLevelCategoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, supplier_group_no = #{supplierGroupNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, supplier_group_name = #{supplierGroupName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, brand_unit_no = #{brandUnitNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, brand_unit_name = #{brandUnitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, category_no = #{categoryNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, category_name = #{categoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, new_style_flag = #{newStyleFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, style_type = #{styleType,jdbcType=CHAR}, year_code = #{yearCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, year = #{year,jdbcType=CHAR}, season = #{season,jdbcType=CHAR}, season_name = #{seasonName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, add_basis = #{addBasis,jdbcType=CHAR}, effective_time = #{effectiveTime,jdbcType=DATE}, add_price = #{addPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, add_discount = #{addDiscount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, discount_rate = #{discountRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) as s FROM headquarter_cost_maintain WHERE add_rule_no = #{params.addRuleNo}

SELECT hpr.* FROM item it INNER JOIN supplier_group_rel sgr ON it.supplier_no = sgr.supplier_no INNER JOIN settle_category_dtl scd ON it.root_category_no = scd.category_no INNER JOIN brand b ON it.brand_no = b.brand_no INNER JOIN headquarter_price_rule hpr ON FIND_IN_SET( sgr.group_no, hpr.supplier_group_no ) AND FIND_IN_SET( scd.settle_category_no, hpr.category_no ) AND FIND_IN_SET(b.sys_no, hpr.brand_unit_no) LEFT JOIN `settle_new_style_dtl` snsd ON it.`years` = snsd.`year_code` AND ( it.`sell_season` = snsd.`season_no` OR snsd.season_no = 'ALL' ) WHERE it.item_no = #{itemNo} AND ( ( hpr.style_type = snsd.style_no AND hpr.new_style_flag = 1 ) OR ( hpr.new_style_flag = 0 AND FIND_IN_SET(it.years, hpr.year_code) AND (hpr.season = it.sell_season OR hpr.season ='ALL') ) ) AND ( FIND_IN_SET( LEFT(it.category_no, 4), hpr.two_level_category_no ) OR ( hpr.two_level_category_no = '' OR hpr.two_level_category_no IS NULL ) ) ORDER BY hpr.effective_time DESC
